title: Simulation-Based Training for Optimizing GelMA Hydrogel Mechanical Properties

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: VR environment simulation tool enabling real-time observation and manipulation of hydrogel property changes.

learning_goals: Explain the impact of GelMA hydrogel's molecular network density (DMN) on biomedical applications
Quantitatively analyze GelMA's mechanical property changes based on degree of substitution (DS) and concentration variations using simulation tools
Design experiments to optimize GelMA hydrogel for specific tissue engineering/drug delivery purposes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
